name: @vakac995/react-calendar
description: A flexible, customizable React calendar component with date range and time picker support
author: vakac995

scripts.build: npm run build:lib && npm run build:demo
scripts.validate: npm run lint && npm run format:check && npm run typecheck && npm run circular
scripts.check: npm run validate && npm run build
scripts.deploy:npm: npm run build:lib && npm publish --access public
scripts.deploy:cf: npm run build:demo && wrangler pages deploy demo-dist --project-name=react-calendar-demo
scripts.deploy:all: npm run deploy:npm && npm run deploy:cf
scripts.release: npm run check && npm version patch && npm run deploy:all && git push && git push --tags
scripts.release:minor: npm run check && npm version minor && npm run deploy:all && git push && git push --tags
scripts.release:major: npm run check && npm version major && npm run deploy:all && git push && git push --tags
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run validate && npm run build:lib
